section.title: GetResourcePoolsByTag
section.para: GetResourcePoolsByTag returns an array of ResourcePool objects. The input is a tag string.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate GetResourcePoolsByTag usage:

example.title: GetResourcePoolsByTag WSDL
